page.title: 07Ecology (general)
page.content:
The mixture of countryside ___ heath, woodland (deciduous and coniferous), arable fields, pasture, water meadows, ponds and river mean there is an{abundance of wild life}of all descriptions.
Many species of{birds, insects and {flowers}which are becoming very{rare in many parts of Great Britain still {abound here.}The{sandy soil}and general climatic conditions produce many plants which are normally found on the coast and{20 species of flora {are only found in Breckland.
(contd on P.8)
